mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, writer, board_title, contents, board_type, postdate FROM BOARD WHERE writer = #{writer} ORDER BY postdate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.com_idx, c.board_idx, c.popup_board_idx, c.com_writer, c.com_contents, c.com_postdate, c.com_img, m.name AS comWriterName, p.board_title AS popup_title FROM COMMENTS c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.com_writer = m.id JOIN POPUP_BOARD p ON c.popup_board_idx = p.board_idx WHERE c.com_writer = #{writer} AND c.popup_board_idx IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.com_postdate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENTS c WHERE c.com_writer = #{writer} AND c.popup_board_idx IS NOT NULL
